alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 25 at 12:42PM MST until November 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com. Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
